name: Interstellar Blaster
description: Interstellar Blaster is a project I work on in my free time. I am a computer science student and have a hectic schedule so my free time is limited. This is my first attempt at publishing a game I have built. My goal is that I will make enough money from this game and other games I plan to make that I can quit my job in fast food. Donating to this game helps me, a broke college student, do the things I love. I will continue to work on this game until I feel it is a complete and cohesive experience. I have shown this game to my friends and family and I absolutely love it when they enjoy what I have created. I hope anyone who downloads this game also enjoys it! The more feedback I receive the more inspired I feel to work on my project so please tell me what you think. While this game is in development I will keep it free with optional donations. Once it is finished I will set a minimum price. I also plan to release this game on mobile if I make enough money to buy the licensing I need to do so.
